messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the consequence of a fumble in Firearms specializations?
of a fumble is doubled and that they risk killing their investigator (or losing a limb) should this happen.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the 'Firearms' skill cover in Firearms specializations?
The generic 'Firearms' skill cannot be purchased.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of skill points can be spent on the 'Bow' specialization?
15%: use of bows and crossbows, ranging from medieval longbows to modern, high-powered compound bows.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What percentage of skill points can be spent on the 'Handgun' specialization?
20%: use for all pistol-like firearms when firing discrete shots.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the skill to use for machine pistols in Modern era games?
Submachine Gun skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the skill to use for grenade launchers, anti-tank rockets, etc.?
Heavy Weapons skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the skill to use for larger wood axes?
Axe skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the skill to use for single shots from a bipod?
Rifle skill
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Rifle skill used for?
Firing any type of rifle (whether lever-action, bolt-action or semi-automatic) or scatter-gun
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When to use the Rifle skill for a single shot?
When firing from a bipod
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Submachine Gun skill used for?
Firing any machine pistol or submachine gun; also for assault rifles set on burst
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where can you find a list of firearms?
Table XVII: Weapons (pages 401-405)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of skill is used when firing a shotgun?
When an assault rifle fires a single shot (or multiple singles), use this skill.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary purpose of the First Aid skill?
The user is able to provide emergency medical care.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary use of the Submachine Gun skill?
Firing any machine pistol or submachine gun; also for assault rifles set on burst
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How quickly must First Aid be delivered to be effective?
within one hour
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary effect of successful use of First Aid?
rouse an unconscious person to consciousness
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Can a character use First Aid to treat diseases?
no, Medicine skill is required
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is required for a successful First Aid treatment?
Either one of the people administering First Aid rolls a success
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What effect does successful First Aid have on a dying character?
It stabilizes the character for one hour and grants 1 temporary hit point
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How often does a character must make a successful CON roll to remain stabilized after successful First Aid?
At the end of the hour and each hour thereafter
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a character fails a CON roll while stabilized by successful First Aid?
The character loses the temporary hit point and must make a CON roll per round thereafter
